instructions:
The **AD&D 1e Revised Sheet** includes all of the basic stats from the existing **AD&D 1st Edition Sheet** on Roll20 and should also be compatible with other OSR-style systems such as **OSRIC**. The **AD&D 1e Revised Sheet** may continue to change as needed/requested by the Roll20 community.
**NOTE:** Updating an existing **AD&D 1st Edition Sheet** character with the **AD&D 1e Revised Sheet** should automatically migrate most attributes. That said, there are some sheet changes, newer attributes, and features that may require minimal, manual editing/updating in order to get full sheet functionality. I highly suggest testing the **AD&D 1e Revised Sheet** template on a copy of any existing **AD&D 1st Edition Sheet** game to see how the migration may effect your game. Simply change the character sheet template to the game settings to the **AD&D 1e Revised Sheet**.
**Sheet Highlights:**
 - Sheet roll buttons for Ability-based skills, Saves, Thief Skills, Attacks, Spells, Special Abilities, and more.
 - Repeatable Weapons, Equipment, Spells, Special Abilities, Non Weapon Proficiencies.
 - Subcategories for Equipment.
 - Armor Details section that is linked to Equipment|Armor 
 - Hover over fields and buttons to view the associated attributes name and descriptive text.
 - Roll templates for Attacks, &{template:attacks} and a General &{template:general} for custom macro {key}={value}
 - Monster sheet statblock
**Sheet Auto-Calculations:**
 - Ability row attributes auto-fill according to the PHB.
 - Hit Points and AC.
 - Saves and Thief Skills
 - Total Armor bulk, Encumbrance, and Movement
 - Encumbrance and costs for Equipment, Armor, Weapons, and Coins.
**Sheet Options:**
 - to-Hit Matrix or THAC0 table whispered to the DM when using the attack button.
 - Background Options (parchment, goldenrod, moldvay, etc.).
 - Hide/Show various sections of the sheet as desired. 
 - Nearly all sheet macros are customizable. Attacks, Surprise, Initiative
----------
Please post suggestions/questions/comments to the Roll20 Character Forum.
https://app.roll20.net/forum/category/277980
